name: Asana Dark, Reduce Noise, Tasks Projects Menu Move
description: Combines for a cleaner dark setting. Hides certain items from side menu such as calendar, new projects, etc. pushes the task's projects and tags up above description
additional_info:
Also moves the project and tags setting up near top again so its right under owner and date.

Consolodates https://userstyles.org/styles/152027/asana-dark-theme-textured-background and https://userstyles.org/styles/143591/asana-simplified-and-with-more-hierarchy

Relocation the projects and tasks came from here https://community.asana.com/t/unhelpful-ui-change-project-tabs-buttons-in-tasks-pushed-down/20394/114

- hides many menu items from sidebar to reduce the noise
- hides the "like" button
- to show these when needed simple temp turn off style from menu icon.
